home.title: Give a Dog the Love They Deserve
home.subtitle: Help support our foster dogs through virtual adoption or by donating supplies they need for a happy, healthy life.
home.virtualAdoptionDesc: Sponsor a dog monthly to help with their ongoing care and needs.
home.donateSuppliesDesc: Purchase specific items from each dog's wishlist that they need.
home.shareStoriesDesc: Help spread the word about our dogs and their journeys to forever homes.

dogs.noResults: No dogs match your current filter. Please try another category.

footer.description: Providing loving temporary homes for dogs in need.
